title: Service Delivery Manager Job at Barnksforte Group Limited
content:
Barnksforte Group Limited is a diverse conglomerate which operations spans across different sectors of the economy; health, housing, energy, agriculture, and technology. The Company’s core business focus is to develop state of the art technology that meets the needs of its Clients in Nigeria and Globally.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Service Delivery Manager
Job Locations: Abuja & Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Description
Our Exciting Opportunity:
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	We are now looking for a Service Delivery Manager who will be responsible for ensuring the correct and proper delivery of customer support services to our customers.
	In this role, you will be responsible for the Technical and financial performance of delivered customer support services.
	You will also ensure that agreed margins are achieved whilst delivering Service Level Agreement fulfillment and customer satisfaction.
	The role also includes leading the customer network support engineers’ team and working closely with the competence centers, global support, and product line maintenance teams.


Responsibilities
You will:


	Responsible for the financial and commercial as well as environment, health and safety (EHS) performance of delivered customer support services
	Collaborate and maintain relationships
	Active contributor in the Sales process, identify new business opportunities and drive Add on Sales, in cooperation with Account team
	Manage the contractual requirements towards the Customer Support organization
	Distribute information to internal partners and call out delivery Issues
	You will stay up to date with financial data
	24/7 support in emergency situations


Requirements
To be successful in the role you are:


	Minimum of Graduate Degree in Engineering (Telecommunication or IT preferred) or equivalent
	Minimum of 10 years of working experience and at least 5 years of Service Delivery Management experience.
	E2E knowledge of Telecom Network including Cloud, Core, RAN and Revenue Management Nodes
	Financial analysis skills
	Negotiation and argumentation
	Presenting & Communicating information
	You will promote knowledge sharing and mentoring
	Delivering Results & Meeting Customer Expectations
	Responsible for delivering results & meeting customer expectations
	You will drive Entrepreneurial & Commercial Thinking
	Change and improvement management skills
	Leading & Supervising
	Deciding & initiating action
	You are capable of coping with pressures & setbacks


You should also have:


	Very good leadership and management skills
	Excellent social skills and strong customer orientation
	Self-motivated and teammate.
	Ability to adapt to change
	Ability to work under pressure
	Trade compliance knowledge
	Persuading & Influencing
	Relating & Networking.


Salary
N400,000 - N700,000 Monthly.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: careers@barnksfortegroup.com using the Job Position and Location as the subject of the mail.

title: Internal Human Resources Manager (HR) Job at Ziba Consulting
content:
Ziba Consulting is a dynamic recruitment and consulting firm committed to connecting top talent with the right opportunities. Our mission is to help businesses streamline their hiring processes while supporting job seekers in achieving their career goals.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Internal Human Resources Manager (HR)
Job Location: Lekki Phase I, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time
Work Mode: Hybrid
Reports To: COO & CEO

Position Overview
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	We are a dynamic HR consulting firm committed to delivering high-impact solutions to our clients.
	We work with speed, strategy, and precision, and we’re looking for a proactive HR Manager to lead our internal HR operations and help us continue building a high-performance culture.


Job Summary


	The ideal candidate is a performance-oriented professional who can create and improve trackers, monitor employee activities, call out defaulters, and develop performance reports to guide strategic decisions. You must demonstrate strong leadership, communication, and organizational skills to thrive in our fast-paced environment.


Key Responsibilities


	Develop, manage, and improve HR trackers for attendance, performance, and compliance.
	Monitor employee activities and proactively follow up with defaulters.
	Generate and present performance reports to management, highlighting trends and areas for improvement.
	Ensure HR policies are up-to-date and effectively communicated across the company.
	Coordinate recruitment, onboarding, and offboarding processes.
	Lead and manage employee performance review cycles and recommend development strategies.
	Drive employee engagement, retention, and team productivity.
	Handle employee relations, conflict resolution, and disciplinary procedures firmly but fairly.


Requirements


	Bachelor's Degree in Human Resources, Industrial Relations, Business Administration, or related field.
	1–3 years of progressive HR experience in a fast-paced environment.
	Proven ability to create, monitor, and improve HR performance.
	Strong reporting and data analysis skills (Excel, Google Sheets, HRIS tools, etc.).
	Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
	Strong leadership qualities and the ability to work with minimal supervision.
	Proactive, detail-oriented, and firm when addressing performance or compliance issues.


What We Offer


	N200,000 monthly
	Opportunity for growth and leadership within the company
	Exposure to a diverse range of HR projects and clients
	Collaborative and fast-paced work environment.

title: Admin Officer Job at G-Shoppers
content:
G-Shoppers is a leading grocery delivery e-commerce platform based in Port Harcourt, dedicated to providing convenient and easy food shopping experiences for homes, career women, and businesses. We aim to make cooking effortless for our customers by offering: Convenient shopping: An easy online shopping experience, Fresh produce: Top-notch foodstuffs and meat products, and Prepped ingredients: Ready-to-use food ingredients to make cooking a breeze.

We offer a wide range of products, including Fresh meat, Seafood, Frozen foods, Dry foods, Vegetables, Fruits and Prepped, ready-to-cook food ingredients. At G-Shoppers, we're committed to delivering exceptional service, quality products, and a seamless shopping experience to our customers.
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    



We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Admin Officer
Job Location: Eliozu, Port Harcourt, Rivers
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	We are seeking a highly organized, detail-oriented, and versatile Administrative Officer & Executive Assistant to support our dynamic team at G-Shoppers.
	The successful candidate will provide administrative support, tracking of KIPs and assist the Managing Director (MD) in various capacities.


Key Responsibilities
Administrative Support:


	Documentation of all staff files and update when neccesary and tranfering of hard copies to soft copies.
	Staff Support: Provide support to staff members, including onboarding, training, and performance monitoring.
	Executive Assistance: Assist the MD with scheduling appointments, managing emails, and preparing reports.
	Compliance: Ensure compliance with organizational policies, procedures, and regulatory requirements.
	Record-Keeping: Maintain accurate and up-to-date records, files, and databases.
	Communication: Develop and implement effective communication strategies to ensure seamless information flow.


Requirements


	Education: Bachelor's Degree in Business Administration, Management, or a related field.
	Experience: At least 1 year of experience in administration or a related field.
	Skills: Excellent communication, organizational, and time management skills.
	Software: Proficient in Microsoft Office, Google Suite, and other productivity software.
	Living not far away from Eliozu.


Salary
N100,000 monthly.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their Application and CV to: gshoppersrecruitment@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

title: Account Officer Job at G-Shoppers
content:
G-Shoppers provide easy food shopping support to homes, career men, women and business people who are faced with the challenge of being constantly away from home and have less or no time to shop as well as cook. We execute orders to supply food stuff and items such as fresh meat, seafood, frozen, dry foods, vegetables, fruits, and prepped, ready-to-cook food ingredients. We are based in Port Harcourt.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Account Officer
Job Location: Rivers
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	We are looking for an account officer to assist in managing the company's finances, to also record and analyze financial data.
	Record financial data, analyze this data, and prepare regular reports
	Regular bookkeeping to ensure accounting is accurate and up-to-date
	Ensure each operational facility has accurate financial data
	Lead the company's relationship with banks and other financial houses
	Work with the management team in approving company expenses
	Assist with budget preparation and financial forecasting
	Analyze financial data using ERP or Quickbooks and other accounting software
	Relate with external auditors and tax consultants.


Requirements


	First Degree in Accounting, Banking and Finance, Economics, or a similar financial field.
	Advanced use of Microsoft Excel or Google Sheets
	Very detailed and not easily distracted
	Should reside near Eliozu
	Should be willing to work Monday to Saturday with one day off a month
	Should be agile, smart, and deeply analytical.
	Ready to resume in a few days.


Salary
N100,000 monthly.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: gshoppersrecruitment@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.
